nodes.text: The Fath sector was a sector in the Outer Rim Territories that included the Fath system and the planets JanFathal and Ord Cantrell. It also contained the Earth system and the planet Earth as well as Spaceport THX1138.
Around 22 BBY, a battle took place in the Fath system.
In 1 BBY, the Empire conducted a raid at the Star Tours-owned Spaceport THX1138 to find and arrest a Rebel spy near the Earth system.
Karen Traviss' 2009 book The Clone Wars: No Prisoners incorrectly places JanFathal and the Fath system in the Dantus sector.
